item.title: Editing Content in Quartz
item.description: Editing Quartz runs on top of Hugo so all notes are written in Markdown . All content in your garden can found in the /content folder. To make edits, you can open any of the files and make changes directly and save it. You can organize content into any folder you’d like. To create a link, just create a normal link using Markdown pointing to the document in question. Please note that all links should be relative to the root /content path.
